availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, saddler. Native of Ireland. Married to Sarah Gallagher McGrath. Father of Margaret McGrath, Sarah A. McGrath, Jr., John A. McGrath, Matthew McGrath, William McGrath, and Phillip Sarsfield McGrath. Saddler in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1860. Saddler in partnership with Patrick Burke in Louisville in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, District 7, p. 460.

"Phillip S. McGrath," Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 14877.
